articles.title: Astronauts with disabilities can apply to Europe's space agency for 1st time - CBC.ca
articles.description: In our push for a human presence in space, there has been a group who have been left out, no matter how well-educated, fit or skilled they are: people with physical disabilities. The European Space Agency is aiming to change that.
articles.content: Since humans began to have a presence in space, only about 550 people have been in orbit around our planet. That's because astronauts are considered the elite: well-educated, in peak physical health … [+5337 chars]

articles.title: Real outclassed as loss raises fresh doubts around old guard - SuperSport
articles.description: Real Madrid were not just beaten but outplayed, their defeat by Chelsea on Wednesday clear enough to spell the end of a team that has gone on and on but can no longer match the best in Europe.
